name: Russian Tank Simulator VR
description:
Slava Ukraini!

Have you ever dreamt of driving a Russian tank? Well, me neither. But anyway, now you can! As the operator of a so-called "High Tech State of the Art" Z-tank you have order to make your way to the frontline – or at least not to lose your vehicle (which will happen eventually). Keep an eye on your fuel management and be aware of Ukrainian "predators" trying to seize your, well, not too valuable weapon.

This is a charity project, you can either play the game for free or donate as much as you like. 90% of the net revenue  (or even more if the game goes  skyrocket) will go to charity for the support of Ukrainian refugees. 10% (or less if the game goes skyrocket) will flow into the development of our other game. For transparency reasons we will share the monthly  charity bill on our discord channel.

Discord: https://discord.gg/GJATAbN7yT

The game is VR only, tested with Oculus/Meta Quest 1/2 and Rift.
No guarantee the game will work on other headsets.

This game is the result of a personal "A Game in a Week" challenge.
